title: A plea for almes delivered in a sermon at the spital, before a solemn assembly of the city, on Tuesday in Easter week, April. 13. 1658. / By Thomas Watson Minister of Stephens Walbrook. Lond.
author: Watson, Thomas, d. 1686.
publisher: Printed for Thomas Parkhurst at the three Crowns over-against the great Conduit at the lower end of Cheap-side,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
